title: Industry experts bat for solar power in the long term
description: Solar energy is set to play a crucial role in the global energy transition due to climate change, declining costs, and its proximity to consumers. Experts at the International Solar Festival highlighted India's potential, with over 300 days of sunshine and ambitious renewable energy targets, making solar a significant opportunity for the country.
